import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../../App.css"; import { Modal,Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Contact = () => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const [userData, setUserData] = useState({ Name: "", date: "", phone: "", email: "", mem: "", dcity: "", dplace: "", message: "", }); let name, value; const postUserData = (event) => { name = event.target.name; value = event.target.value; setUserData({ ...userData, [name]: value }); }; // connect with firebase const submitData = async (event) => { event.preventDefault(); const { Name, phone, email, date,mem,dplace,dcity, message } = userData; if (Name && phone && email && date && mem && dplace&& dcity && message) { const res = fetch( "https://first-push-21b3f-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/userDataRecords.json", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ Name: "", phone: "", email: "", date: "", mem: "", dplace: "", dcity: "", message: "", }), } ); if (res) { setUserData({ Name: "", phone: "", email: "", date: "", mem: "", dplace: "", dcity: "", message: "", }); alert("Data Stored"); } else { alert("plz fill the data"); } } else { alert("plz fill the data"); } }; return (

); }; export default Contact;
